mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Cornett, Reuben
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Taylorsville, Jackson Co., Tennessee [Taylorsville, Jackson County, Tennessee]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Cornett, Reuben Patient Age: 24. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of right scapula. Bullet entering 1 inch to the right of the 5th dorsal vertabra passing under scapula. Direction downwards and outwards to exit 2 inches to the left of axillary region.. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Treatment: Simple dressings. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cornett, Reuben

Gun shot flesh wound of right scapula. Bullet entering 1 inch to the right of the 5th dorsal vertabra passing under scapula. Direction downwards and outwards to exit 2 inches to the left of axillary region.
Private
I
2 VA Cav [2nd West Virginia Volunteer Cavalry]
